org.cyclops.cyclopscore.client.key

Interface IKeyRegistry

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRegistry
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    KeyRegistry

    public interface IKeyRegistry
extends IRegistry
    Hotkey registry

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addKeyHandler(net.minecraft.client.settings.KeyBinding kb, IKeyHandler handler)
      Binds a IKeyHandler to key presses of the specified KeyBinding.
      void onPlayerKeyInput(net.minecraftforge.client.event.InputEvent.KeyInputEvent event)
      Handles key presses for keybindings added by EvilCraft Make sure to annotate this with SubscribeEvent

    • Method Detail

      • onPlayerKeyInput

        void onPlayerKeyInput(net.minecraftforge.client.event.InputEvent.KeyInputEvent event)
        Handles key presses for keybindings added by EvilCraft Make sure to annotate this with SubscribeEvent
        Parameters:
        event - The input event.

      • addKeyHandler

        void addKeyHandler(net.minecraft.client.settings.KeyBinding kb,
                   IKeyHandler handler)
        Binds a IKeyHandler to key presses of the specified KeyBinding. Whenever the KeyBinding is pressed, IKeyHandler.onKeyPressed(KeyBinding) is called.
        Parameters:
        kb - KeyBinding to which we bind the IKeyHandler.
        handler - IKeyHandler that will be linked to presses of the given KeyBinding.
